name: Sol and Luna
description:
Sol and Luna is a 2 player coop indie game made at the GAMED game jam in UW-Whitewater.

Help:

Sol the Sun Paladin:

A and D to walk left and right.

W to jump on the top side, or attack on the bottom side.

S to jump on the bottom side, or attack on the top side.

Luna the Night Thief:

Left and Right arrow keys to walk left and right.

Up arrow key to jump on the top side, or attack on the bottom side.

Down arrow key to jump on the bottom side, or attack on the top side.

Spacebar to switch sides of the map (use this to solve puzzles and advance)

Luna first must attack near shadow monsters to steal the darkness from them.

Switching to Sol, attack the lightened creatures to kill them and drop health orbs.

Sol cannot pick up health orbs, but Luna can.

Sol can only jump one block, but Luna can double jump very high.  Use spacebar to solve simple jump puzzles.

Both Sol and Luna share health, shown by the sun and moon's brightness.  When Sol or Luna get hurt, the sun and moon gets darker.

When the sun and moon turn black, it's game over.

Touch keys to pick them up.  Touch doors with the keys to open them.

Attack while holding a key to throw it.

Get Sol and Luna to the end of the level to win.
